    <script>
        $('.tcode-w .tcode').mouseenter(function () {
            $('.tcode-w').addClass('tcodeHover');
        }).mouseleave(function () {
            $('.tcode-w').removeClass('tcodeHover');
        })

        shopItem.init('5b9b55a5534b7f6295a9d3b8');

        // 延时加载
        $('.c img').lazyload({
            threshold: 200,
            placeholder: "https://p.ssl.qhmsg.com/t016a7da517888c2ffa.gif"
        });

        var dealWithBtns = function (value) {
            value = parseInt($.trim(value), 10);
            var max = '0' | 0;
            var storeNum = parseInt('513', 10);

            if (max > 0 && value >= max) {
                $(".gcIpt .increment").addClass("disabled");
            }
            else if (value >= storeNum) {
                $(".gcIpt .increment").addClass("disabled");
            }
            else {
                $(".gcIpt .increment").removeClass("disabled");
            }

            if (value > 1) {
                $(".gcIpt .decrement").removeClass("disabled");
            }
            else {
                $(".gcIpt .decrement").addClass("disabled");
            }
        };

        $(".goodsCount").bind("setvalue", function (e) {
            dealWithBtns($(this).val());
        });

        $(".goodsCount").bind("textblur", function (e) {
            var tar = $(e.target);
            var text = $.trim($(tar).val());

            if ("" === text) {
                $(tar).val("1");
                $(tar).trigger("setvalue");
                return;
            }

            if (!/^\d+$/.test(text)) {
                $(tar).val("1");
                $(tar).trigger("setvalue");
                return;
            }

            var val = parseInt(text, 10);
            var max = '0' | 0;
            var storeNum = parseInt('513', 10);

            if (val === 0) {
                $(tar).val("1");
                $(tar).trigger("setvalue");
                return;
            }

            if (max > 0 && val > max) {
                qikoo.dialog.alert("购买数量超出限制!");
                $(tar).val(max);

                $(tar).trigger("setvalue");
                return;
            }

            if (max == 0 && val > storeNum) {
                qikoo.dialog.alert("购买数量超出库存!");
                $(tar).val(storeNum);

                $(tar).trigger("setvalue");
                return;
            }

            $(tar).trigger("setvalue");
        });

        $(".goodsCount").on("blur", function () {
            $(this).trigger("textblur");
        });

                $(".decrement,.increment").click(function (e) {
            var count = $(this).siblings(".goodsCount").val() | 0;
            var num = $(this).attr('data-num') | 0;
            var max = '0' | 0;

            count = count + num;

            if (count < 1) {
                count = 1;
                $(".decrement").addClass("disabled");
            }
            else if (max > 0 && count > max) {
                qikoo.dialog.alert("已达到最大购买数量，无法继续添加");
                $(".increment").addClass("disabled");
                count = max;
            }
            else {
                $(".increment").removeClass("disabled");
                $(".decrement").removeClass("disabled");
            }

            $(this).siblings(".goodsCount").val(count);
            $(".goodsCount").trigger("setvalue");
        });

        $(".decrement,.increment").hover(function (e) {
            var eobj = $(e.target);
            if (!eobj.hasClass("disabled")) {
                eobj.addClass("hover");
            }
        }, function (e) {
            $(e.target).removeClass("hover");
        });


        $(".getCart,.gInfoBtn-addcart").click(function (e) {
            _et = $(e.target);

            QHPass.when.signIn(function () {
                var qtoken = "f03ef2f650a7b63d3e855ccbf3ab26da";
                var qtoken_timestamp = "1558358084";
                $.post("/shop/addtocart", {
                    item_id: "5b9b55a5534b7f6295a9d3b8",
                    num: $(".goodsCount").val(),
                    qtoken: qtoken,
                    qtoken_timestamp: qtoken_timestamp
                }, function (dt) {
                    if (dt.errno == 0) {
                        // shopItem.cartTip(_et);
                        location.href = "/shop/shopcart";
                    } else if (dt.errno == 40011) {
                        location.href = "/shop/shopcart";
                    } else {
                        qikoo.dialog.alert(dt.errmsg);
                    }
                }, 'json');
            })
        });
            </script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var _mvq = window._mvq || [];
    window._mvq = _mvq;
    _mvq.push(['$setAccount', 'm-251506-0']);
    _mvq.push(['$setGeneral', 'goodsdetail', '', /*用户名*/ '', /*用户id*/ '']);
    _mvq.push(['$logConversion']);
    _mvq.push([
        '$addGoods',  
        /*分类id*/ '0', 
        /*品牌id*/ '571e3457f28d0132e83339c5', 
        /*商品名称*/ '360可视门铃   赠送两天循环永久云录',
        /*商品ID*/ '5b9b55a5534b7f6295a9d3b8',
        /*商品售价*/ '319.00', 
        /*商品图片url*/ 'https://p.ssl.qhimg.com/t01c553c8bf6dbc1214.png', 
        /*分类名*/ '', 
        /*品牌名*/ '360', 
        /*商品库存状态1或是0*/ 319.00 > 0 ? 1 : 0, 
        /*网络价*/ '349',
        /*收藏人数*/ '383', 
        /*商品下架时间*/ '',
        /*一级分类名*/'智能家居',
        /*二级分类名*/'家居办公',
        /*三级分类名*/'智能安防',
    ]);
    _mvq.push(['$addPricing', /*价格描述*/ '']);

    _mvq.push(['$logData']);
</script>

<script type="text/javascript" src="https://s.ssl.qhres.com/!c2c090e2/monitor_analytic.js"></script>
<script>
  if (location.protocol == 'https:') {
    for (var key in monitor.config) {
      if (typeof monitor.config[key] == 'string') {
        monitor.config[key] = monitor.config[key].replace('http://', 'https://')
      }
    }
  }

  function searchToObject() {
    var pairs = window.location.search.substring(1).split('&'),
      pair,
      i,
      obj = {
        utm_medium: '',
        utm_source: '',
        utm_campaign: '',
        utm_term: '',
        utm_content: '',
        item_id: ''
      }
    var keys = [
      'utm_medium',
      'utm_source',
      'utm_campaign',
      'utm_term',
      'utm_content',
      'item_id'
    ]

    for (i in pairs) {
      if (pairs[i] === '') continue

      pair = pairs[i].split('=')
      if (keys.indexOf(pair[0]) > -1) {
        obj[decodeURIComponent(pair[0])] = decodeURIComponent(pair[1])
      }
    }

    if (obj.utm_source) return removeKey(obj)

    $.each(keys, function(i, key) {
      var value = document.cookie.match(
        new RegExp('(^| )' + key + '=([^;]*)(;|$)')
      )
      obj[key] = value ? value[2] : obj[key]
    })
    return removeKey(obj)
  }
  function removeKey(obj) {
    var data = {}

    for (var key in obj) {
      if (obj[key] != '') {
        data[key] = obj[key]
      }
    }
    return data
  }
  monitor.data.getTrack = function() {
    var source = document.cookie.match(/(^| )utm_source=([^;]*)(;|$)/)
    var utmsrc = source ? source[2] : ''
    var xsource = document.cookie.match(/qid%3D([\d]*)/)
    var searchObject = searchToObject()

    if (!searchObject.utm_source) searchObject.utm_source = utmsrc

    if (xsource) searchObject.qid = xsource[1]
    searchObject.b = monitor.util.getBrowser()
    searchObject.c = monitor.util.getCount()
    searchObject.r = monitor.util.getReferrer()
    searchObject.fl = monitor.util.getFlashVer()

    return searchObject
  }
</script>
<script>
	monitor.setProject('QH_328_1', {utm_source: $.cookie('utm_source')||''}).getTrack().getClickAndKeydown().getClickHeatmap(10, 1);
	window.onerror = function (message, source, lineno, colno, error) {
		console.log(arguments, this);
		try {
			var errorTxt = error;
			if (error.toString) errorTxt = error.toString();
			if (error.stack) errorTxt = error.stack;
		}
		catch (e) { }
		monitor.log({
			type: 'sendJsError',
			msg: message,
			source: source,
			line: lineno,
			col: colno,
			error: errorTxt,
			ua: window.navigator.userAgent
		}, 'track')
	}
</script>

        String.prototype.protocol = function(){

            var str = this;

            str = window.isSupportWebp ? (str.replace(/(\.jpg|\.png)/g, ".webp")) : str;

            return str.replace(/http:\/\/p\d\.qh[imgs]{3}/,"https://p.ssl.qhmsg");

        window.isSupportWebp = false;
        void function(){

        	var webpTestsUri = 'data:image/webp;base64,UklGRiQAAABXRUJQVlA4IBgAAAAwAQCdASoBAAEAAwA0JaQAA3AA/vuUAAA=';

			var image = new Image();

			function addResult(event) {
			    // if the event is from 'onload', check the see if the image's width is
			    // 1 pixel (which indiciates support). otherwise, it fails

			    window.isSupportWebp = event && event.type === 'load' ? image.width == 1 : false;
			}

			image.onerror = addResult;
			image.onload = addResult;

			image.src = webpTestsUri;
        }();

            </div>

            <div class="gTit">
                
                <a name="gConsult" style="display:block;visibility:hidden;position:relative;top:-100px;"></a>常见问题
            </div>
            <div class="gCon">
                <dl class="consult">
                                            <dt><big>1、</big><i></i>订单提交成功后还可以修改收货信息吗？</dt>
<dd><i></i>订单付款之前，您可以进入“我的订单”，在订单详情页内修改收货信息。付款之后将不可修改收货信息。</dd>

<dt><big>2、</big><i></i>支付完成后还能取消订单吗？如何取消？</dt>
<dd>支付完成后，配货之前可以取消订单，您可以进入“我的订单”，直接点击订单后面取消按钮。</dd>

<dt><big>3、</big><i></i>订单取消后还能恢复吗？</dt>
<dd>订单一旦取消将无法恢复，请您慎重操作。</dd>

<dt><big>4、</big><i></i>订单取消成功后退款如何返还？</dt>
<dd>订单取消后，退款会按照您购买时的支付方式原路返回到您的银行卡。</dd>

<dt><big>5、</big><i></i>对商品不满意可以申请退换货吗？如何操作？</dt>
<dd>在确认收货后，7天之内可以申请退货。15天之内可以进行换货，具体操作如下:<br>退货：进入“我的订单”，在操作区域中点击申请退货，填写问题描述，提交服务单即可申请退货。<br>
换货：请拨打我们的客服热线400-1555-360，在客服的指导下完成换货。</dd>

<dt><big>6、</big><i></i>为什么我的订单总是无法提交成功？</dt>
<dd>可能存在以下几种情况：<br>（1）订单信息填写不完整；<br>（2）订单商品库存不足或者库存无货；<br>（3）网络延时及以上各种情况都会在页面中弹出提示信息，可以通过修改订单信息（提示信息）或者稍后再试，即可成功提交订单。</dd>

<dt><big>7、</big><i></i>订单已提交成功，如何付款？</dt>
<dd class="item7">您好，360会员商城目前支持的支付方式分为支付宝和微信。请在订单提交后30分钟内完成付款。</dd>
<dd class="item7-yjhx" style="display:none;">您好，目前支持的支付方式为微信支付，请在订单提交后2小时内付款完成。</dd>

<dt><big>8、</big><i></i>订单已支付成功，什么时候可以发货？</dt>
<dd>您好，360会员商城会在48小时内安排发货。物流信息您可进入“我的订单”实时查看。详见 <a href="/user/myorder" target="_blank">我的订单>></a></dd>

<dt><big>9、</big><i></i>订单发货后，还可以改送到其他地方吗？</dt>
<dd>您好，订单发货后无法修改。请在提交订单前仔细检查核对。</dd>

<dt><big>10、</big><i></i>我的地址比较偏僻，你们能送到吗？</dt>
<dd>EMS能够到达的区域我们都提供配送服务。</dd>                                    </dl>
            </div>

        var dealWithBtns = function (value) {
            value = parseInt($.trim(value), 10);
            var max = '0' | 0;
            var storeNum = parseInt('23', 10);

            if (max > 0 && value >= max) {
                $(".gcIpt .increment").addClass("disabled");
            }
            else if (value >= storeNum) {
                $(".gcIpt .increment").addClass("disabled");
            }
            else {
                $(".gcIpt .increment").removeClass("disabled");
            }

            if (value > 1) {
                $(".gcIpt .decrement").removeClass("disabled");
            }
            else {
                $(".gcIpt .decrement").addClass("disabled");
            }
        };

        $(".goodsCount").bind("setvalue", function (e) {
            dealWithBtns($(this).val());
        });

        $(".goodsCount").bind("textblur", function (e) {
            var tar = $(e.target);
            var text = $.trim($(tar).val());

            if ("" === text) {
                $(tar).val("1");
                $(tar).trigger("setvalue");
                return;
            }

            if (!/^\d+$/.test(text)) {
                $(tar).val("1");
                $(tar).trigger("setvalue");
                return;
            }

            var val = parseInt(text, 10);
            var max = '0' | 0;
            var storeNum = parseInt('23', 10);

            if (val === 0) {
                $(tar).val("1");
                $(tar).trigger("setvalue");
                return;
            }

            if (max > 0 && val > max) {
                qikoo.dialog.alert("购买数量超出限制!");
                $(tar).val(max);

                $(tar).trigger("setvalue");
                return;
            }

            if (max == 0 && val > storeNum) {
                qikoo.dialog.alert("购买数量超出库存!");
                $(tar).val(storeNum);

                $(tar).trigger("setvalue");
                return;
            }

            $(tar).trigger("setvalue");
        });

        $(".goodsCount").on("blur", function () {
            $(this).trigger("textblur");
        });

                $(".decrement,.increment").click(function (e) {
            var count = $(this).siblings(".goodsCount").val() | 0;
            var num = $(this).attr('data-num') | 0;
            var max = '0' | 0;

            count = count + num;

            if (count < 1) {
                count = 1;
                $(".decrement").addClass("disabled");
            }
            else if (max > 0 && count > max) {
                qikoo.dialog.alert("已达到最大购买数量，无法继续添加");
                $(".increment").addClass("disabled");
                count = max;
            }
            else {
                $(".increment").removeClass("disabled");
                $(".decrement").removeClass("disabled");
            }

            $(this).siblings(".goodsCount").val(count);
            $(".goodsCount").trigger("setvalue");
        });

        $(".decrement,.increment").hover(function (e) {
            var eobj = $(e.target);
            if (!eobj.hasClass("disabled")) {
                eobj.addClass("hover");
            }
        }, function (e) {
            $(e.target).removeClass("hover");
        });


        $(".getCart,.gInfoBtn-addcart").click(function (e) {
            _et = $(e.target);

            QHPass.when.signIn(function () {
                var qtoken = "f4a565825f8d9592b0821e78a653bdc2";
                var qtoken_timestamp = "1558358134";
                $.post("/shop/addtocart", {
                    item_id: "5981950ae059bf3233c8aa55",
                    num: $(".goodsCount").val(),
                    qtoken: qtoken,
                    qtoken_timestamp: qtoken_timestamp
                }, function (dt) {
                    if (dt.errno == 0) {
                        // shopItem.cartTip(_et);
                        location.href = "/shop/shopcart";
                    } else if (dt.errno == 40011) {
                        location.href = "/shop/shopcart";
                    } else {
                        qikoo.dialog.alert(dt.errmsg);
                    }
                }, 'json');
            })
        });
            </script>

<script type="text/javascript" src="https://s.ssl.qhres.com/!c2c090e2/monitor_analytic.js"></script>
<script>
  if (location.protocol == 'https:') {
    for (var key in monitor.config) {
      if (typeof monitor.config[key] == 'string') {
        monitor.config[key] = monitor.config[key].replace('http://', 'https://')
      }
    }
  }

  function searchToObject() {
    var pairs = window.location.search.substring(1).split('&'),
      pair,
      i,
      obj = {
        utm_medium: '',
        utm_source: '',
        utm_campaign: '',
        utm_term: '',
        utm_content: '',
        item_id: ''
      }
    var keys = [
      'utm_medium',
      'utm_source',
      'utm_campaign',
      'utm_term',
      'utm_content',
      'item_id'
    ]

    for (i in pairs) {
      if (pairs[i] === '') continue

      pair = pairs[i].split('=')
      if (keys.indexOf(pair[0]) > -1) {
        obj[decodeURIComponent(pair[0])] = decodeURIComponent(pair[1])
      }
    }

    if (obj.utm_source) return removeKey(obj)

    $.each(keys, function(i, key) {
      var value = document.cookie.match(
        new RegExp('(^| )' + key + '=([^;]*)(;|$)')
      )
      obj[key] = value ? value[2] : obj[key]
    })
    return removeKey(obj)
  }
  function removeKey(obj) {
    var data = {}

    for (var key in obj) {
      if (obj[key] != '') {
        data[key] = obj[key]
      }
    }
    return data
  }
  monitor.data.getTrack = function() {
    var source = document.cookie.match(/(^| )utm_source=([^;]*)(;|$)/)
    var utmsrc = source ? source[2] : ''
    var xsource = document.cookie.match(/qid%3D([\d]*)/)
    var searchObject = searchToObject()

    if (!searchObject.utm_source) searchObject.utm_source = utmsrc

    if (xsource) searchObject.qid = xsource[1]
    searchObject.b = monitor.util.getBrowser()
    searchObject.c = monitor.util.getCount()
    searchObject.r = monitor.util.getReferrer()
    searchObject.fl = monitor.util.getFlashVer()

    return searchObject
  }
</script>
<script>
	monitor.setProject('QH_328_1', {utm_source: $.cookie('utm_source')||''}).getTrack().getClickAndKeydown().getClickHeatmap(10, 1);
	window.onerror = function (message, source, lineno, colno, error) {
		console.log(arguments, this);
		try {
			var errorTxt = error;
			if (error.toString) errorTxt = error.toString();
			if (error.stack) errorTxt = error.stack;
		}
		catch (e) { }
		monitor.log({
			type: 'sendJsError',
			msg: message,
			source: source,
			line: lineno,
			col: colno,
			error: errorTxt,
			ua: window.navigator.userAgent
		}, 'track')
	}
</script>
